title: Altcoin
short_description: Altcoin or Alternative coin usually refers to cryptocurrencies other than Bitcoin. Examples are Litecoin, Monero, Ethereum, etc.
full_description: Altcoins are the other cryptocurrencies launched after the success of Bitcoin. Generally, they sell themselves as better alternatives to Bitcoin. The term 'altcoins' refers to all cryptocurrencies other than Bitcoin. As of early 2020, there were more than 5,000 cryptocurrencies by some estimates. According to CoinMarketCap, altcoins accounted for over 34% of the total cryptocurrency market in February 2020. [1]
